review_title: 7 years of service tossed out like it was trash
pros: Was employed for 7 years with no laps and managed to move up once between departments.
cons: I put in 7 years at the college as a tutor, secretary, Prep English and Reading Lab Assistant, and Adjunct teacher. I was "let go" one month after I made the announcement that I was pregnant with my first child.  It did not impact how I performed and did not make me less able to do my job. I was told I was let go due to budget cuts but I was the only person let go in the department and it happened right after I told my boss I was pregnant.
